issue.title: Chrome 40+ still chaches basket redirection
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Following #899 : Chrome 40+ still chaches basket redirection
Switch to HTTP 302 in PHP instead of 303 with Joomla Framework.
Switch to JApplicationWeb instead of JResponse (is deprecated since Joomla 3.4)

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0

comments.body:
